dcterms:creator: R. Girju
P. Nakov
V. Nastase
S. Szpakowicz
P. Turney
D. Yuret
dcterms:description: A well-used dataset, built by combining the SemEval 2007 Task 4 dataset and the SemEval 2010 Task 8 dataset. The SemEval datasets provide predefined positive and negative sentences with corresponding entity pairs.
dcterms:title: SemEval

dcterms:description: A newly created dataset by the authors, containing 349 sentences, each of which are positive having confirmed cause-effect phrases. Three human experts labeled the cause and effect phrases from these sentences with 100% inter-expert agreement.
dcterms:title: MedCause

dcterms:creator: H. Gurulingappa
A. Mateen
A. Roberts
J. Fluck
M. Hofmann-Apitius
L. Toldo
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides cause and effect terms in sentences, used for training models to predict whether there is a cause-effect relationship between a given term-pair in a given sentence.
dcterms:title: ADE

dcterms:creator: R. Girju
P. Nakov
V. Nastase
S. Szpakowicz
P. Turney
D. Yuret
dcterms:description: A dataset from the SemEval 2007 Task 4, providing predefined positive and negative sentences with corresponding entity pairs.
dcterms:title: Semeval-2007

dcterms:description: A dataset from the SemEval 2010 Task 8, providing predefined positive and negative sentences with corresponding entity pairs.
